comment.body: I can't upload a profile picture. Everytime i try, it don't change anything. What is weirder is that the JS console tell me that the profile picture as been uploaded. I dont know if its a bug or just me being stupid.

> [nofish](#comment_143_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Have you tried it with another image/browser?

Yes, i tried with a couple of different images and tried on Firefox Chrome and Edge. It does not work in any of these cases
